label: 北条五代記
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: The Hōjō godaiki...records the history of the Go-Hōjō house, describes the successive heads of teh family and the major Go-Hōjō vassals as having emphasized the importance of Confucian moral values (p. 399). [後北条]
